Package withplugin.plugins

Class SensorPlugin

java.lang.Object
fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractPlugin
withplugin.plugins.SensorPlugin
All Implemented Interfaces:
fr.sorbonne_u.components.PluginI, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.network.interfaces.SensorNodeP2PImplI, Serializable
public class SensorPlugin extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractPlugin implements fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.network.interfaces.SensorNodeP2PImplI
The Sensor class represents a network sensor node within a distributed sensor network. It handles tasks such as registering with a registry, managing connections to other nodes, and processing sensor data queries.

This class offers interfaces to handle sensor data requests and node connections, and requires interfaces to connect to other nodes, the registration service, and the clock server. The sensor node operates within an accelerated time context provided by a clock server and interacts with other nodes in the network to perform distributed queries and data aggregation.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Malek Bouzarkouna, Younes Chetouani, Mohamed Amine Zemali

    • execute

      public fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.QueryResultI execute(fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.RequestI request) throws Exception
      Processes a request by wrapping it into a RequestContinuationI instance and executing it. This method prepares the node's state and forwards the request for detailed processing.
      Parameters:
      request - The RequestI instance containing the initial request details.
      Returns:
      A QueryResultI object representing the result of the query execution.
      Throws:
      Exception - If any errors occur during the processing of the request.

    • execute

      public fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.QueryResultI execute(fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.RequestContinuationI requestContinuation) throws Exception
      Executes a sensor network query based on a continuation request. This method handles both geographic and broadcast queries by updating and evaluating the state of execution based on sensor data and node information. It also manages network communication with neighboring nodes to fulfill the query requirements.

      This method checks if a request has been processed before to avoid redundant processing and potential infinite loops in the network.

      Specified by:
      execute in interface fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.network.interfaces.SensorNodeP2PImplI
      Returns:
      A QueryResultI object representing the aggregated or evaluated result after executing the query.
      Throws:
      Exception - If there are issues in query processing or during network communication.

    • executeAsync

      public void executeAsync(fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.RequestContinuationI requestContinuation) throws Exception
      Asynchronously executes a request based on the provided RequestContinuationI. This method is intended for asynchronous handling of requests where the results are not immediately required to be returned but can be processed in a non-blocking manner.

      This method is currently a stub and needs to be implemented.

      Specified by:
      executeAsync in interface fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.network.interfaces.SensorNodeP2PImplI
      Parameters:
      requestContinuation - The RequestContinuationI object representing the request continuation.
      Throws:
      Exception - If there are issues in processing the request asynchronously.

    • ask4Connection

      public void ask4Connection(fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.NodeInfoI neighbour) throws Exception
      Attempts to establish a connection with a specified neighbouring node. This method updates the graphical interface to reflect the connection and adds the neighbour to the known set. It determines the appropriate direction and manages the connection based on the determined direction.
      Specified by:
      ask4Connection in interface fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.network.interfaces.SensorNodeP2PImplI
      Parameters:
      neighbour - The NodeInfoI instance representing the neighbouring node to connect with.
      Throws:
      Exception - If managing the connection based on direction fails.

    • ask4Disconnection

      public void ask4Disconnection(fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.NodeInfoI neighbour) throws Exception
      Disconnects from a specified neighbouring node. This method updates the graphical interface to reflect the disconnection and uses the directional information to manage the disconnection process.
      Specified by:
      ask4Disconnection in interface fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.network.interfaces.SensorNodeP2PImplI
      Parameters:
      neighbour - The NodeInfoI instance representing the neighbouring node to disconnect from.
      Throws:
      Exception - If there is an issue in managing the disconnection.

    • registerAndConnectToNeighbor

      public void registerAndConnectToNeighbor()
      Registers the current node and establishes connections with all known neighbours. This method logs the registration process and proceeds to connect to each neighbour individually.
